Summary: orange plasma looking fireballs that hover over trees,they travel any direction and seem to come in packs
trends: There have been no other sightings in Lexington
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailswe saw about 8 fireball looking things hovering over trees and they seem to go down well about 4am they came back up and turned into red flashing light with a clear white one that stayed on and flew off.the next night we saw more of them and then the next we saw 27 of them.we havent seen but 1 since then and it was in a little diffrent location,also we could see some little white lights high in the sky that would zoom everywhere but they seem to be gone also.contact me and i will give you alot more detailed info on what we saw.my whole family watched these.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
